name: Retro Online
description:
Oldschool 2d MMORPG ! RETRO ONLINE ! hope you like it

Pre Alpha !

Hey check out the cool oldschool 2d mmorpg ! Discover the world of Retro Online with your friends today!

In a open world kill bosses and become stronger or help the villagers to earn some exp. Fight as  a warrior mage priest or fight your way along as a ranged fighter!

1. download the game

2. create an account

3. walk with the arrow keys use the mouse hit crtl to attack and enjoy
